This dress fits perfectly.
I bought in 4 colors. I recommend going up one size. Very clingy- but you can adjust it. Would recommend!
I've got so many compliments wearing this dress!
Love this dress, and feel that it runs true to size (for a tight fit). The brown was a beautiful camel color that worked great for Thanksgiving. Very happy with this purchase.

I’m 5’4 and I weigh 145. I bought a medium and it fit perfect. I love this dress. Super comfortable. Can dress it up or down. Fabric is not thick but not too thin at all. I bought it for work. I waitress and we had to wear all black on NYE so I was wearing this all night and was super comfortable !

I cannot say enough. I have 2 tank dresses in black and one in the aqua color. The black one hides everything somehow. I’m pretty curvy in the hip and booty and this compliments as opposed to highlighting any lumps and bumps. The lighter color is harder to wear but I expected that. Both are fantastic layering pieces. I’m going to try the tshirt sleeve next. Please treat yourself and buy this dress made of magic.

I’m not attaching photos as she is underage and it is fitted and a bit on the shorter side, fits very similar to the stock photo. I ordered her normal size (which is a Small) and it fit perfect!

This is a super stretchy dress, and is really cute. It’s not a thick material so its perfect for any time of the year. I’m 5’9”, and the dress goes mid thigh. It doesn’t feel too exposed or too long. Genuinely perfect. Buy it!

Very cute dress top that fits my 37 week pregnant belly with room to stretch. Pre-pregnancy I was a size xs/small in everything. I ordered medium just to be safe — I’m almost 150lbs now, but a small likely would’ve fit my belly just fine too. The fabric is super soft and stretchy. Feels almost like modal. Wish I’d discovered these sooner — I would’ve gotten multiple colors / styles!
Both my girls loved this dress. Both have different shapes. Love how you can make it longer or shorter. It scrunched on the sides but not trashing. So flattering. Great staple dress.
